text: Manzoor Hussain (28 October 1958 â€“ 29 August 2022), better known as Manzoor Junior, was a Pakistani field hockey player. He won a bronze medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics and a gold medal at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Pakistan Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Pakistan Category:Pakistani field hockey players
title: Manzoor Hussain (field hockey)
